short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatic sign-in for Medium-based publications with custom domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Medium Automatic Sign-In is an extension that will automatically sign you in on Medium-based publications that use custom domains. No more annoying fixed top navigation bar and bottom "Get Updates" bar!

Medium Automatic Sign-In is not affiliated with Medium.
